scripts.release:major: bun run release.pre && dotenv release-it -i major --ci
scripts.release:minor: bun run release.pre && dotenv release-it -i minor --ci
scripts.release:patch: bun run release.pre && dotenv release-it -i patch --ci
scripts.release.pre: bun sync-pack && bun run build && bun test
scripts.build: bun build:cli && bun build:codegen && bun build:runtime && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp bun.lockb dist/bun.lockb
scripts.build:cli: cd packages/cli && bun tsup && cp package.json ../../dist/packages/cli/package.json && cp ../../README.md ../../dist/packages/cli/README.md && cp ../../LICENSE ../../dist/packages/cli/LICENSE
scripts.build:codegen: cd packages/codegen && bun tsup && cp package.json ../../dist/packages/codegen/package.json && cp ../../README.md ../../dist/packages/codegen/README.md && cp ../../LICENSE ../../dist/packages/codegen/LICENSE
scripts.build:runtime: cd packages/runtime && bun tsup && cp package.json ../../dist/packages/runtime/package.json && cp ../../README.md ../../dist/packages/runtime/README.md && cp ../../LICENSE ../../dist/packages/runtime/LICENSE
scripts.publish: bun publish:cli && bun publish:codegen && bun publish:runtime
